title: ‘Nothing’s Changed Since Mader’s Death’: Geraint Thomas Presses UCI to Improve Safety
content:
2018 Tour de France winner says peloton exasperated at lack of safety improvements in professional cycling: 'I feel they could do so much more.'

Read the full article at ‘Nothing’s Changed Since Mader’s Death’: Geraint Thomas Presses UCI to Improve Safety on Velo.
author: ahood
